price: Për ata që ruhen (nga gjynahet), tek Allahu do të ketë kopshte të kënaqësive.
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
